text.section: The primary duty of the Public Defender is to provide representation for indigent individuals in accordance with this title.

section.section: Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, in Baltimore City, the Public Defender may contract with private or public organizations to provide legal, administrative, or technical services for indigent individuals.

A contract shall require that:
the level and quality of the work at least equal that of the Office; and
the Public Defender supervise and control all services rendered.
